steps: Peel zucchini into noodle-like sticks (a Julianne peeler helps), Thinly slice the mushrooms; transfer to a small bowl. Peel and mince garlic; transfer to a small bowl
Heat a sauté pan over medium heat
Slice the chicken in half horizontally to form thin fillets. Season both sides with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in the pan and swirl to coat bottom. Add chicken and cook until golden brown and cooked through, 2-3 minutes per side. Transfer to plate.
Once chicken has been removed, melt remaining butter in the sauté pan. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, 15-30 seconds.
Add the sliced mushrooms and cook stirring occasionally, until softened, 2-3 minutes.
Add the cream and bring to a simmer. Stir in the cheese, salt and pepper.
Add the zucchini noodles to the sauce and gently toss until well coated
Slice the chicken on an angle
To serve, place fettuccine alfredo in a bowl or on a plate, top with chicken, and garnish with freshly ground pepper.
